topics.title: Admin Help
topics.string:
Welcome to the Admin Help System.

To see a list of possible Admin commands use:
_help commands

topics.title: Build Games
topics.string:
To build games, use the following syntax:

_buildgame <Game Key>

Note:
The Game Key must match the game's root directory in the ~/Admmin/GameSources/ directory.
The output database will match this key.
